title: A declaration of the Lord Broghil, and the officers of the army of Ireland in the province of Munster
author: Orrery, Roger Boyle, Earl of, 1621-1679.
publisher: Printed by William Bladen, by special order ;
notes: Signed at end: "Broghill." i.e., Roger Boyle, Earl of Orrery [and 42 others].
